attributes.action: Change the law on Driving whilst using a mobile phone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most people will agree that there are more and more people using mobile phones whilst driving.

It is proven driving whilst using a mobile phone distracts your attention  and also doesnt make you aware of the current situation and surroundings outside the car to respond quickly enough. 
This means that using a mobile phone whislt driving is just as bad as being a drunk driver 

I with your help want the law to be changed to ban drivers caught using a mobile phone while driving because the increased fine and 3 points on the liscence is not working
